mean_en: a group of letters and numbers that are used as part of an address so that post/mail can be separated into groups and delivered more quickly
sentence: Don't forget to write down the postcode before sending the letter!
sentence_trans: 在寄信前别忘了填邮政编码！
word_etyma: post 邮件，邮政 + code 编码 → postcode（英）邮政编码
